title: unnai ninaindu
sahitya:
unnai ninaindu ninaindu uruguginrAL Or maDandai


anupallavi

  tannai unakkE tandAL vandAL andip-paghalum vegu sondamuDan manadil


caraNam    O gaja rakSaka vAnavarkkAga mOhini vaDivu koL tAnavar kAla
yOgiyar uLLam vaLar tAmaraip-pAdA UNurakkamum marandAL arivizhandAL
